parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: Welcome to the Game! Type 'help' for more info.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer:
Help commands: 
1. 'help' or '.' to show this menu
2. Number of game (e.g. 2) for playing the game
3. 'exit' or 'q' to leave the program

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: Please enter a valid option. Type 'help' for more info.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: Game started! Type 'help' for more info.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer:
Help commands: 
. for help menu
l for looking around the room (ls)
w, a, s, d or 'w', 'a', 's', 'd' for moving player
moving up (w), down (s), left (a), right (d) using w, a, s, d respectively with absolute path to move player.
cd .. for moving back to previous room or place
pick item or pick <item_name> to get the item
check inventory or inv for checking your items
